```{r baseGraphics}
library(MASS)
plot(UScereal$sugars, UScereal$calories)
title("Plot(USCereal$sugars, USCereal$Calories)")
```

```{r gridGraphics}
#Get the data and load the grid package
library(MASS)
x <- UScereal$sugars
y <- UScereal$calories
library(grid)

#Grid code to generate the plot
pushViewport(plotViewport())
pushViewport(dataViewport(x, y))
grid.rect()
grid.xaxis()
grid.yaxis()
grid.points(x, y)
grid.text("USCereal$calories", x = unit(-3, "lines"), rot = 90)
grid.text("USCereal$sugars", y = unit(-3, "lines"), rot = 90)
popViewport(2)
```
